attributes.action: The government to help the 46,000 people who prepaid their funerals in advance
attributes.additional_details: Most people may not be able to asve that sort of money again due their age myself I am 80 nd my husband is 95 and the cost of two funerals is a lot of money to have to find twice
attributes.background: what ever they can as most of the people are the elderly and believed they where protected as it was supposed to be in a trust fund

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614579
